options.cookeymod.animations.swingAndUse: If on, the swinging animation will not be
cancelled when you start interacting with an item.
options.cookeymod.animations.enableOldSw: Brings back the old swinging animation from 1.16.
options.cookeymod.animations.sneakAnimat: Changes the speed of the transition when your eye
options.cookeymod.animations.disableCame: When "View bobbing" is on, this will disable
the camera shake when walking while keeping the
arm animation. Note that this option §4does not
§4work with shaders enabled§r in Iris due to
options.cookeymod.animations.enableToolB: Enables a blocking animation on your tools when
blocking with a shield similar to the 1.8 sword
options.cookeymod.animations.showEatingI: Enables an eating & drinking animation in 3rd
options.cookeymod.animations.enableDamag: Makes your camera tilt into the direction of your
options.cookeymod.hudRendering.attackCoo: Changes how far your weapon goes down in 1st
options.cookeymod.hudRendering.damageCol: Changes the color of the damage tint on entites.
options.cookeymod.hudRendering.showDamag: Makes the damage tint also appear on armor.
Can also enable the tint on trims.
options.cookeymod.hudRendering.onlyShowS: Hides the shield in 1st person when it is not
options.cookeymod.hudRendering.disableEf: Ignores changes in the FOV caused by potion
effects (sprinting FOV is unaffected by this).
options.cookeymod.hudRendering.showHandW: Show hand in 1st person when you are invisible.
options.cookeymod.hudRendering.firstPers: Changes the opacity of the hand in first person
when "Show hand when invisible" is on and the
options.cookeymod.misc.showModButton.too: Changes whether the CookeyMod button should be
shown in the options menu of Minecraft.
options.cookeymod.misc.showOwnNameInThir: Makes your own name appear over your player in 3rd
options.cookeymod.misc.force100PercentRe: Forces you to always recharge 100% of the weapon
cooldown after missing. This might be helpful for
improving your aim and timing in the Combat Tests.
options.cookeymod.misc.fixLocalPlayerHan: Fixes a bug in the client that causes particles to
appear and that cancels your sprint even when a hit
has been cancelled when attacking a player.
options.cookeymod.misc.fixCooldownDesync: Fixing the attack cooldown on the client being
desynchronized in some cases when breaking or
placing blocks or when dropping items.
